net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: log.debug ("Entering getInventory")]
[h: toon = arg(0)] [h: filterType = arg(1)] [h, if (json.length (macro.args) > 2): itemName = arg(2); itemName = "_all"]
[h: log.debug (json.get (toon, "name"))] [h: log.debug (filterType)]
[h: inventoryArry = json.path.read (toon, "data.inventory[*].[?(@.definition.filterType == '" + filterType + "')]")] [h: selectedItem = json.path.read (inventoryArry, ".[?(@.name == '" + itemName + "')]")] [h, if (json.length (selectedItem) > 0): selectedItem = json.get (selectedItem, 0); selectedItem = "{}"] [h: log.debug ("selectedItem: " + json.indent (selectedItem))] [h, if (itemName == "_all"): macro.return = inventoryArry; macro.return = selectedItem]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dndb_getInventory
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Returns an item or items. A filterType must be specified, but a name may be optional.
arg(0) = toon arg(1) = filterType optional: arg(2) = name
ex. dnd_getInventory (toon, "Other Gear", "Backpack")
